originalText.text: I enjoy wearing and selling Gabriel jewelry. Being married 36 years and needing to reset my diamond in a great design look and that goes with my original wedding band. It was special on how the two look great together and very elegant. I get many compliments and that gives me a chance to let others know what great personal care and attention to the customer's needs. At my age and with the older ring set and able to use the diamond of 36 years and update a new look makes it still special. Thank you.

originalText.text:
Gabriel & Co is an exceptional company. Not only do they give back to Charities but also to the people in the community. I was very fortunate to be on the receiving end during the initial outbreak of Covid. So when the time came, I wanted to be able to support Gabriel & Co and wanted to make a purchase. I bought these beautiful Sterling Silver Earrings and have been absolutely over the moon with them. I wear them every day and never take them off! The price I paid was minimal compared to what I received...  you would have thought I bought a thousand-dollar pair of earrings. I felt like a princess when the box arrived and I opened the box. The packaging alone made me feel like royalty and for a minute I thought I had been sent the wrong package.
I am a nurse and the beautiful earrings look so delicate but have stood up to daily wear (I even sleep and shower in them). They hug the ear just enough to be able to wear to work without worry. They go with everything I wear from casual to dress. By far one of the best purchases I have made and not to mention it also supports Autism.
Thank you Gabriel & Co. for making each person feel special!

originalText.text: I love Gabriel & Co.! This ring is my second piece from them and I have no doubt that my collection will only grow! Their style is impeccable. As an added bonus, my delivery came presented in the nicest box. I highly recommend Gabriel & Co. to all of my friends and family.

originalText.text:
It is such a joy selling Gabriel ......whether it is Bridal or fashion. Customers are drawn to the beautiful wearable designs.
Any questions I my have, the Gabriel staff is very attentive either on the phone or by chat on the website.
The quality is impeccable. Delivery is always as promised.
And the added bonus of accumulating points for selling the Gabriel merchandise is wonderful.
I enjoy all of the Gabriel merchandise I have been able to buy with my points!!

originalText.text: I LOVE Everything about this Company!!! The quality, the designs, the customer service, the promptness on delivery and the genuine care we receive from every person who contributes to making a beautiful piece of jewelry.  I just said to one of the customer service people how kind they always are and I feel like I know them personally.
